long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Now set tabs to open automatically on daily, weekly, or monthly schedules.
Update: The active window's URL is now added automatically.
 
Schedule links to be opened at specific date and time. Don't just add to calendar, AutoTab it! 

You can open specified links when you need them:
1. Recipes at dinner time daily: If you have a list of recipes that you want to try out for dinner, you can use AutoTab to open the recipe link automatically at dinner time every day. 
2. Payment website when you need to pay people: You need to pay rent on the 1st of every month, you can create a schedule in AutoTab and set the date and time for the 1st of the month, then add the payment website link to the schedule. AutoTab will open the link automatically at the set time, so you can make the payment without having to remember to do it.
3. Schedule a news website to open at 7am every morning, so you can stay up-to-date on current events.
4. Schedule a website for your favourite TV show to open at the time the show airs, so you never miss an episode.

Here are some additional benefits of scheduling links to be opened at specific dates and times:

Save time by having links open Automatically right when you would need them.
Never forget to open important links.
Stay organised by having all of your important links in one place.
